name: Immunization Calculation Engine
description: ICE is an open source immunization evaluation and forecasting clinical decision support system

sdgs.relevance: ICE promotes best practices for immunization to ensure that infectious diseases that can be controlled through vaccination are contained.

bestPractices:
ICT4D
   - Principles For Digital Development

Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
   - User stories
   - Change management using version control
   - Test driven development using automated tests
   - Code review
   - Code refactoring
   - Rapid application development
   - Agile development
   - Architectural Design

Architectural Principles
   - Modularity and Maintainability
   - Reusability and Extensibility
   - Microservices architecture

Software Architectural Styles
   - Multitier architecture
   - Representational state transfer (REST)
   - Service-oriented
   - Component-based
   - Peer-to-peer
   - Cloud computing patterns

Open Source
   - Best practices For Open Source Maintainers
   - Open Source Tips
